name: Reefward Isles
role_in_state: Shipbuilding, reef-guard and coastal trade transshipment hub
culture_adjustments: boat-name oaths legally tied to reef tenure
kin-tracks oriented toward maritime lineages, not landholdings
oral reef-navigation songs and coral-sign reading traditions
market disputes settled by tide-judges and pier councils
artisanal coral-runic carving common among craftsmen
constraints: limited arable land; reliant on imported grain
ritual magic dependent on scarce reef reagents
navigation hazards restrict large cargo vessels
notes: seasonal population flux with migrant crews
key source of shipwright labor for State_14
augury stations support coastal trade routes
